title: H. Muslim ibn Aqeel (as)
text: DESC: Muslim ibn Aqeel was the son of Aqeel ibn Abi Talib, and therefore was a first cousin to Imam Husayn (peace be upon him). The Imam (peace be upon him) sent Muslim as his ambassador to Kufa, where Muslim (peace be upon him) was brutally murdered by the Umayyads on the 9th of Dhul-hijjah. His shrine is within the Premises of the Masjid Kufa nearNajaf Iraq.
INFO: Permission of entrance to the shrine
almu`tarifi birububiyyatihi jami`u ahli alssamawati wal-aradina
`alayka ya muslimu bna `aqili bni abi talibin
wa jahadta fi allahi haqqa jihadihi
wa qutilta `ala minhaji almujahidina fi sabilihi
hatta laqita allaha `azza wa jalla wa huwa `anka radin
wa ashhadu annaka wafayta bi`ahdi allahi
wa badhalta nafsaka fi nusrati hujjati allahi wabni hujjatihi
bima sabarta wa ihtasabta wa a`anta
wa la`ana allahu man amara biqatlika
wa la`ana allahu man jahila haqqaka
wa la`ana allahu man baya`aka wa ghashshaka
wa man allaba `alayka wa lam yu`inka
alhamdu lillahi alladhi ja`ala alnnara mathwahum
wa anna allaha munjizun lakum ma wa`adakum
hatta yahkuma allahu wa huwa khayru alhakimina
wa alssalamu `alaykum wa rahmatu allahi wa barakatuhu
qatala allahu ummatan qatalatkum bilaydi wal-alsuni
almuti`u lillahi wa lirasulihi wa li'amiri almu'minina
ashhadu annaka madayta `ala ma mada `alayhi albadriyyuna
wa awfara jaza'i ahadin mimman wafa bibay`atihi
ashhadu annaka qad balaghta fi alnnasihati
wa ja`ala ruhaka ma`a arwahi alssu`ada'i
wa a`taka min jinanihi afsahaha manzilan
ashhadu annaka lam tahin wa lam tankul
wa annaka qad madayta `ala basiratin min amrika
DESC: You may then offer a two-unit prayer at the side of his head and present this prayer as your gift to him.
DESC: You may recite duas in the shrine if you want.
